select prodimg1 from prodregis where prodname = #{prodname}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO salestate (NO, PRODNAME, PRICE, SUBMON, SUBVOL, GRINDING, CID, STORENAME, CONDITION, CADDR, BID) VALUES (sale_seq.NEXTVAL, #{prodname}, #{price}, #{submon}, #{subvol}, #{grinding}, #{cid}, #{storename}, '처리중', #{caddr}, #{bid})
